ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: We thank Sysolyatin Sergey at the Institute for Problems of Chemical and Energetic Technologies, Biysk, Russia, for providing antiviral drug oseltamivir ethoxysuccinate. Construction of the tree was done using sequences deposited in GISAID. We are grateful to GISAIDâ€™s EpiFluTM Database ( http://www.gisaid.org) and to the authors who provided sequence information.
